title: Unable to use influence points
body: Im trying to buy a champion and im unable to see the highlighted version of buying it with ip. anyone have anything like this and any suggestions how to fix?

replies.body:
This is a fairly rare bug that occurs on the *Beta Client* sometimes. You should be able to bypass this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WfvYVEtZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-27T05:46:42.903+0000)
>
> This is a fairly rare bug that occurs on the *Beta Client* sometimes. You should be able to bypass this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
> 
> Let me know if this worked for you.

it did thx sorry for the late reply
